content.question: The speaker’s exclamation in line 13 (“A steady . . . correspondences”) most clearly serves to introduce a series of observations that illustrate the speaker’s

choices.label: dependence on the natural world as a source of companionship
belief that his suffering is likely to continue unabated
ability to see his emotional struggles reflected in the natural world
persistence in maintaining a dialogue with God

content.answer: ability to see his emotional struggles reflected in the natural world

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
